nests.name: Jim Barnett
nests.notes: Great for driving or walking, also lots of spot you can stop your car to catch and then keep moving.

nests.name: Morven Park
nests.notes: Driving can get you some of the spawns, but most are along walking trails I believe.

nests.name: Ida Lee
nests.notes: Driving can get you a lot of the spawns, but there's plenty of walking paths for hunting too.
